verbose_text: There has been one report of lenalidomide unmasking GS in an individual who was heterozygote for the TA7 allele, which can decrease expression of uridine diphosphate glycuronosyl transferase 1A1, the enzyme responsible for conjugation of bilirubin 8.
evidence: TA7 allele, which can decrease expression of uridine diphosphate glycuronosyl transferase 1A1, the enzyme responsible for conjugation of bilirubin
